system.effect:
-10 Fellowship with relevent group. Such as: Academics, Sororitas, Arbites, Mechanicus, Administratum, Ecclesiarchy, Government, Imperial Guard, Imperial Navy, Inquistion, Military, Navigators, Nobility, Rogue Trader, Underworld, Workers.
Ork Groups Include: Bad Moons, Blood Axes, Death Skulls, Evil Suns, Snakebites, Mekboyz, Painboyz, Runtherdz, Freebooters.
